episodes.title: How to Survive in a Cult and Escape with your Sanity
episodes.description:
Since leaving a cult my life has changed dramatically so I am happy to share how I survived with my Sanity!

Welcome back for another video focused on taking you to THRIVE mode after a lifetime of anxiety and survival mode. If you have been driven and ambitious your whole life and now you are burned out and have a moment to breathe, let's talk about how you can reprioritize your life. If you've married a provider and found yourself struggling to transition to a life of ease and relaxation this video was designed for YOU!!! 
  
3 years ago, I became a stay-at-home wife and was shocked at how difficult it was for me to relax and truly enjoy my blessed life. Since I have spent the time since learning about myself, journaling, doing inner work, and healing-- I hope I can share my wisdom with those who need most to hear it. 

My fave yin yoga video is linked here. 
https://youtu.be/40bPxbFUCj4?si=vXfDMJBukdPsSawH
